column4: I'm having troubles installing libquicktime1 :( http://pastebin.com/d1de423f8 can anyone help me ?
it sures looks troublesome
any idea how to fix it ?
Yes, maybe. We could try doing something to fix if you have broken packages
It's maybe "sudo shutdown 0" it will not shutdown the computer but go to maintenance mode.
this is the broken package I need to fix inorder to install libmjpegtools0c2a
and one of the maintenances is to fix broken packages.
You won't lose anything by trying, but first save all your unsaved works.
Have you tried "shutdown 0" means it will go to maintenace mode in 0 minutes.
right.
Please come back even if it works
I will
Ok.
same errors
Did it not work even under maintenance?
it just says "unmet dependencies" and when it tries to fix them it installs libquicktime1 and the same error comes
Oh...
libquicktime1 is broken
is the ï»¿libquicktime1 package installed right now in a broken state?
no libmjpegtools0c2a is in a broken state because it requires libquicktime1 witch is uninstallable from the repos
sudo apt-get -f install  http://pastebin.com/d4ba35b3e
